SELECT dptr.id, dptr.`name`, dptr.is_countersigned, dptr.task_type, da.`name` AS appName, de.`name` AS envName, dav.version, dptr.application_id, dptr.app_deploy_id, dptr.env_id, dptr.instance_id, dptr.status, dptr.task_id, ( CASE WHEN dptr.instance_id IS NOT NULL THEN dptr.instance_name ELSE NULL END ) instanceName, dptr.task_type, dptr.audit_user, dptr.stage_record_id, ( CASE WHEN dptr.instance_id IS NOT NULL AND dai. STATUS IS NULL THEN 'deleted' ELSE dai. STATUS END ) instanceStatus FROM devops_pipeline_task_record dptr LEFT JOIN devops_application_service da ON da.id = dptr.application_id LEFT JOIN devops_env de ON de.id = dptr.env_id LEFT JOIN devops_app_version dav ON dav.id = dptr.version_id LEFT JOIN devops_app_instance dai ON dai.id = dptr.instance_id WHERE dptr.stage_record_id = #{stageRecordId}
AND dptr.task_id = #{taskId}

SELECT dptr.id, dptr.`name`, dptr.is_countersigned, dptr.task_type, dptr.application_id, dptr.app_deploy_id, dptr.env_id, dptr.instance_id, dptr. STATUS, dptr.task_id, dptr.instance_name, dptr.task_type, dptr.audit_user FROM devops_pipeline_task_record dptr JOIN devops_pipeline_stage_record dpsr ON dpsr.pipeline_record_id = #{pipelineRecordId} WHERE dptr.stage_record_id = dpsr.id AND dptr.task_type = 'auto'
